mapper.select: SELECT id, content_id, image_path, image_order, caption, created_at FROM content_images WHERE content_id = #{contentId} ORDER BY image_order ASC, created_at ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO content_images (content_id, image_path, image_order, caption, created_at) VALUES (#{contentId}, #{imagePath}, #{imageOrder}, #{caption}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE content_images SET image_order = CASE WHEN id = #{imageId} THEN 1 WHEN image_order = 1 AND content_id = #{contentId} AND id != #{imageId} THEN ( SELECT COALESCE(MAX(temp.image_order), 1) + 1 FROM (SELECT image_order FROM content_images WHERE content_id = #{contentId}) temp ) ELSE image_order END WHERE content_id = #{contentId}
mapper.select: SELECT id, content_id, image_path, image_order, caption, created_at FROM content_images WHERE content_id = #{contentId} AND image_order = #{imageOrder} LIMIT 1
